sentences.sContent: Don’t coddle the child – he’s fine!
sentences.sCn: 别太娇惯那孩子——他没事的！

synos.tran: 娇养；溺爱（等于mollycoddle）；用文火煮

remMethod.val: 放入摇篮 (cradle) 悉心照料 (coddle)

trans.tranCn: 娇养， 溺爱； 悉心照料
trans.tranOther: to treat someone in a way that is too kind and gentle and that protects them from pain or difficulty
